meanings.definition: a brand of athletic shoes designed to tone muscles while walking
meanings.sent1: I bought a pair of shapeups to help me get in shape.
meanings.sent2: She wore her shapeups to the gym for her workout.
meanings.sent3: The shapeups made her legs feel like they were getting a workout just by walking.
meanings.sent4: Her shapeups were like little personal trainers for her feet.
meanings.sent5: The shapeups sculpted her calves as she strolled around the park.

meanings.definition: the act of improving physical fitness or appearance through exercise
meanings.sent1: Her daily shapeups routine helped her feel stronger and healthier.
meanings.sent2: He committed to doing shapeups every morning to stay fit.
meanings.sent3: Doing shapeups felt like a fun challenge to her.
meanings.sent4: His dedication to shapeups transformed his body over time.
meanings.sent5: The shapeups routine became a habit that she enjoyed and benefited from.

meanings.definition: a process of organizing or arranging something in a particular way
meanings.sent1: She used shapeups to arrange her closet by color and season.
meanings.sent2: The shapeups of the event were meticulously planned and executed.
meanings.sent3: His shapeups of the books on the shelf made them look neat and tidy.
meanings.sent4: The shapeups of the garden created a beautiful and harmonious space.
meanings.sent5: Her shapeups of the room made it feel spacious and inviting.
